meanings.definition: The total number of people employed by a company or organization.
meanings.sent1: The workforces at the factory have been growing steadily over the past year.
meanings.sent2: The company's workforces are made up of skilled individuals from various backgrounds.
meanings.sent3: The workforces decided to have a team-building day at the park.
meanings.sent4: In the business world, workforces are the engines that drive success.
meanings.sent5: During the busy holiday season, retailers rely on their workforces to meet customer demands.

meanings.definition: The group of employees working in a particular industry or company.
meanings.sent1: The workforces in the tech industry are constantly innovating new products.
meanings.sent2: Our company's workforces are dedicated to providing excellent customer service.
meanings.sent3: The workforces at the office always have a friendly competition during lunch breaks.
meanings.sent4: The workforces in the fashion industry set trends that influence global markets.
meanings.sent5: Workforces in the healthcare sector play a crucial role in saving lives every day.
